      • Cannon

        public Cannon(double radius,
              double angle,
              Game g,
              double aimAngle)
        Represents a cannon object that can shoot projectiles.
        Parameters:
        radius - The height at which it will orbit.
        angle - The angle at which it is orbiting
        g - The game that the proojecile uses for calculations.
        aimAngle - The angle at which the canon is aiming.
